title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On Linux, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller in build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), move below the label. This behavior may confuse users.
EB: The tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), should remain aligned with the label when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
Expected result:
- The tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), should stay aligned with the label as the view is resized smaller.
